channel.title: Starting armor and XP advancement
channel.description:
Hello I need to know how i can change the starting armor when you first make an account
and i also need to know how to make the XP go up faster when i attk the dummy, door, or search in the bayles of hay
thanks. :D

item.title: Starting armor and XP advancement
item.dc:creator: @Sinister-Scape Sinister-Scape
item.description:
@Sinister-Scape wrote:

To change the starting armor go into player.java and search for

//Giving the player an unique look

and then below it change the number to the id of the item you want them to spawn with, if you donâ€™t want them to spawn with anything, type in -1

To make your xp go faster if you click on an object, go into client.java and search for id of the object you want to change and then below it, it will say the exp you get and you can change it.

Read full topic
